name: fimassd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wf(c0, c3, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c2))
-| wi(wf(c0, c3, c2), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c2))
-| wi(wf(c0, c3, c2), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wf(c0, c3, c2), wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c2))

comment: The image of a class is a subset of its codomain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
